boat.full_description: Amber was purchased from her builder, as new, in 1992. The first OGA event that she attended was the Shotley Classic Boat Festival in 1993. She has always been kept in Holbrook Creek and attends as many OGA events as practical. She is often to be seen sailing the Rivers Stour and Orwell, and (on occasions) Walton Backwaters.
boat.name: Amber
boat.short_description: Built in 1991 by Robert Fenton at Harwich Boatcraft. Amber's construction is epoxy coated marine ply.
